languages.text: Я впервые в жизни увидел, как работает благословенная технология кибербестии. Продвинутые ауспексы кибермастифа позволили нам изучить паттерны, по которым были расставлены ловушки, и избегать их максимально эффективно.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.
languages.original_text: Я впервые в жизни увидел, как работает благословенная технология кибербестии. Продвинутые ауспексы кибермастифа позволили нам изучить паттерны, по которым были расставлены ловушки, и избегать их максимально эффективно.

traits.locale_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advances auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them as successfully as possible.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advances auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them as successfully as possible.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

languages.text: 那是我这辈子第一次看到受祝福的生化獒犬的实际战斗场面。多亏了生化獒犬的先进技术，我们成功地识别了敌方陷阱的部署模式，以最有效的方式进行回避。
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 那是我这辈子第一次看到受祝福的生化獒犬的实际战斗场面。多亏了生化獒犬的先进技术，我们成功地识别了敌方陷阱的部署模式，以最有效的方式进行回避。

languages.text: 人生で初めて、祝福されたサイバービーストの技術が実際に動くのを目にした。サイバーマスチフの高度なアウスペクスのおかげで、罠の配置パターンを特定し、最大限の効率で回避することができた。
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 人生で初めて、祝福されたサイバービーストの技術が実際に動くのを目にした。サイバーマスチフの高度なアウスペクスのおかげで、罠の配置パターンを特定し、最大限の効率で回避することができた。

languages.text: Es war das erste Mal in meinem Leben, dass ich die gesegnete Cyber-Bestien-Technologie in Aktion sah. Durch die fortgeschrittenen Auspizien des Cyber-Mastiffs konnten wir Muster bei der Platzierung der Fallen identifizieren und sie mit maximaler Effizienz umgehen.
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Es war das erste Mal in meinem Leben, dass ich die gesegnete Cyber-Bestien-Technologie in Aktion sah. Durch die fortgeschrittenen Auspizien des Cyber-Mastiffs konnten wir Muster bei der Platzierung der Fallen identifizieren und sie mit maximaler Effizienz umgehen.

languages.text: Kutsal siber hayvan teknolojisini hayatımda ilk kez iş başında görüyordum. Siber mastifin gelişmiş uzgörenleri, tuzakların dizilişindeki irtibatı fark etmemizi ve onlardan en verimli şekilde kaçınmamızı sağladı.
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Kutsal siber canavar teknolojisini hayatımda ilk kez iş başında görüyordum. Siber mastifin gelişmiş uzgörenleri, tuzakların dizilişindeki irtibatı fark etmemizi ve onlardan en verimli şekilde kaçınmamızı sağladı.

languages.text: Fue la primera vez en mi vida que vi la bendita tecnología de las ciberbestias en acción. Los aúspex avanzados del cibermastín nos permitieron identificar patrones en la ubicación de las trampas y pudimos evitarlas con la máxima eficiencia.
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Fue la primera vez en mi vida que vi la bendita tecnología de las ciberbestias en acción. Los aúspex avanzados del cibermastín nos permitieron identificar patrones en la ubicación de las trampas y pudimos evitarlas con la máxima eficiencia.

languages.text: C'était la première fois de ma vie que je voyais à l'œuvre la technologie bénie de la cyber-créature. Les auspex avancés du cyber-mastiff nous ont permis de comprendre la disposition des pièges et de les éviter avec une efficacité maximale.
languages.original_text: It was for the first time in my life that I saw the blessed cyber-beast technology in action. The cyber-mastiff's advanced auspexes allowed us to identify patterns in the placement of the traps and avoid them with maximum efficiency.

traits.locale_text: C'était la première fois de ma vie que je voyais à l'œuvre la technologie bénie de la cyber-créature. Les auspex avancés du cyber-mastiff nous ont permis de comprendre la disposition des pièges et de les éviter avec une efficacité maximale.
